original_text: He will agree to be friends with other leaders. But then he will deceive them. He will become more and more powerful, but he will rule only a few people.
korean_text: 그와 약조한 후에 그는 거짓을 행하여 올라올 것이요 소수의 백성을 가지고 세력을 얻을 것이며

sentences.original_text: He will agree to be friends with other leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 지도자들과 친구가 되기로 동의할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But then he will deceive them
He will become more and more powerful
but he will rule only a few people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 소수의 사람만 다스릴 것입니다
